lead_paragraph: LIGHT--Kate, 56, died April 13 in Manhattan of cancer. A longtime violinist with the New York City Opera and an acclaimed poet, Kate united these two passions in becoming an opera and musical theater lyricist and librettist. She will be missed by her many friends and loving family. Kate was preceded in death by her father, Martin. She is survived by her mother, Dorothy, sisters Judith (Charles Wannan) and Betsy, and brother Steve (Kathryn Rand). Memorials to be announced. 1/3
